headline: Simon Property Group Remains A Valuable Investment
summary: Simon Property Group, Inc., a leading American REIT, boasts a market capitalization of nearly $60 billion and a yield of almost 5%. Find out why SPG is a Buy.

headline: Simon Property Thrives With 6.4% Traffic Growth on Black Friday Weekend
summary: SPG's 6.4% traffic growth over the Black Friday weekend, with malls up 7.1%, signals strong holiday momentum for the retail REIT.

headline: USRT: Large Cap U.S. REITs Likely To Trail Small Peers In 2025
summary: iShares Core U.S. REIT ETF tracks 134 US REITs, while Wall Street estimates suggest USRT's top 10 holdings offer a modest upside in 2025. Click for more on USRT.
